attributes.action: To block any attempts to contradict the result off the U.K. European Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
I believe in democracy and whilst I acknowledge the petition to have another Referendum I must announce my distain at the hypocrisy of using the fabulous freedom of free speech and democracy we have in the U.K. when the reasoning behind it is to overturn a vote taking part under UK democratic rules.

I understand that a lot of younger people have been involved ,this is good news for the future but people need to accept that this great freedom is not a game we keep playing until our team wins
attributes.background:
A petition is trying to undermine the will of the greater majority in the UK ref: the European Referendum . 
Whilst I understand that feelings are raw for some democracy won the day and to consider this would be like living in a dictatorship and send the wrong message even to discuss it. Out is out
